response.overview: Paddington travels to Peru to visit his beloved Aunt Lucy, who now resides at the Home for Retired Bears. With the Brown Family in tow, a thrilling adventure ensues when a mystery plunges them into an unexpected journey through the Amazon rainforest and up to the mountain peaks of Peru.
response.tagline: A little bear goes a long way.
response.title: Paddington in Peru

titles.title: Paddington in Peru: Lost in the Jungle
